summary: Outdated dependency on V8 found (see details)
details:
Outdated dependency on V8 found (see [policy](https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/refs/heads/main/docs/security/updates.md)).

Please update to the latest [beta](https://chromium.googlesource.com/v8/v8.git/+/refs/heads/beta), [stable](https://chromium.googlesource.com/v8/v8.git/+/refs/heads/stable), or [extended stable](https://chromium.googlesource.com/v8/v8.git/+/refs/heads/extended) versions.
